DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine bupropion improve symptom restless legs syndrome ( RLS ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Adult patient moderate severe RLS recruit study . Those medication treat RLS ask discontinue medication two week prior begin study . All participant screen Beck Depression Inventory , International Restless Legs Syndrome Study Group ( IRLSSG ) severity scale , Clinical Global Impression Improvement ( CGI-I ) scale . An ordinal scale ( i.e . rate symptom 1-8 ) also obtain . Participants randomize placebo medication group . Those medication group give 150 mg bupropion night six week . Others receive similar-appearing placebo . Participants call end week one , two , four five ass symptom severity base IRLSSG scale , determine experience adverse effect . At three week six week , participant return clinic complete four initial form , Beck Depression Inventory , IRLSSG severity scale , ordinal scale , CGI-I .
